text.p: The following are the leading stories in the Malawi press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- Norway's Minister of Development Cooperation Kari Nordhen-Larsen said on Monday when she donated 32 million kwacaha ($2.1 million) project support for schools, that her country may consider opening a diplomatic office in Malawi.
- The Kingdom of Norway over the weekend pledged to strengthen cooperation with Malawi in various sectors of socioeconomic development when the two governments signed a memorandum of understanding.
